explains: n. 安慰者；圣灵；（美）被子；（英）羊毛围巾

sentences.en: He became Vivien Leigh's devoted friend and comforter.
sentences.cn: 他成了费雯丽的忠实朋友和安慰者。

sentences.en: And of course, you'll need a comforter and a pillow, too.
sentences.cn: 当然，不要忘了被子和枕头。

sentences.en: My comforter was reversible, red on one side, blue on the other.
sentences.cn: 我的被罩是双面的，一面红，一面蓝。
